name: Space Eggs
description:
Space Eggs

Created for the One Button Game Jam, Space Eggs is a program used to incentivize continuous writing. It runs in the background, listening to presses of the space bar, which can be used to hatch eggs, fight monsters, or heal fallen pets.

Run it while you write essays, short stories, or even code games for game jams (finally, debugging was interesting!), and watch your monsters grow.

Features

  • Works in the background. You don't need to stare at the game screen constantly (and you are recommended not to).
  • 10 different monsters (that's 10x better than the previous version!)
  • Custom art (from someone who does not deserve the privilege of creating art)
